content: Shopping centre in SingaporeThe topic of this article **may not meet Wikipedia's general notability guideline**. Please help to demonstrate the notability of the topic by citing reliable secondary sources that are independent of the topic and provide significant coverage of it beyond a mere trivial mention. If notability cannot be shown, the article is likely to be merged, redirected, or deleted. *Find sources:* "Pioneer Mall" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(September 2022)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* **Pioneer Mall** is a 4-storey neighbourhood shopping centre in [Jurong West](/wiki/Jurong_West), [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). [Housing and Development Board](/wiki/Housing_and_Development_Board) set up a HDB Pioneer Service Centre at the shopping centre. Most of the shopping mall is leased by the hypermarket chain [Giant](/wiki/Giant_Hypermarket). Pioneer Mall serves residents mainly living near the [Pioneer MRT station](/wiki/Pioneer_MRT_station). There is also a [McDonald's](/wiki/McDonald%27s) fast food restaurant in the mall. Activities are often held here to bond the community together, through activities organised by the [HDB](/wiki/Housing_and_Development_Board), the South West CDC and West Coast Town Council. This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Pioneer Mall
